entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
